abilityEffect: If Electrode is your Active Pokémon and is damaged by an opponent's attack (even if Electrode is Knocked Out), put 1 damage counter on each of your opponent's Pokémon.

effect.en: If Electrode was damaged by an attack during your opponent's last turn, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.
This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness, Resistance, Poké-Powers, Poké-Bodies, or any other effects on the Defending Pokémon.
